derivation: from the same as H5246 (נָמֵר); clear water;
outline:
Nimrah = "limpid" or "pure"
  1. a place on the east of the Jordan, 10 miles (16 km) north of the Dead Sea and 3 miles (5 km) east of the Jordan
kjv_def: Nimrah. See also H1039 (בֵּית נִמְרָה), H5249 (נִמְרִים).
strongs_def: Nimrah, a place East of the Jordan
